item.title: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ Holds Off ‘Superman’ at Korea Box Office
item.description: Dinosaur tentpole “Jurassic World Rebirth” retained its number one spot at the South Korean box office over the July 11–13 weekend, earning $3.1 million from 456,149 admissions across 1,30
